titleStmt.title: His Majesties declaration, concerning his proceedings with his subjects of Scotland, since the pacification in the camp neere Berwick
titleStmt.author: Windebank, Francis, Sir, 1582-1646.
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R. Young, His Majesties printer for Scotland, and R. Badger, printer to the prince His Highnesse,

notesStmt.note: Written for Charles I by Sir Francis Windebank.
Identified as STC 22006 on UMI microfilm reel 1291.
Reproductions of the originals in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery and the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
Appears on reel 1270 (Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery copy) and at reel 1291 (Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library copy).
